experience.title: New Initiatives
experience.description: Worked on pre-paid cards distribution network in Nigerian market as part of our aim to solve for financial inclusion in the geography. Had to wind up because of the structural issues in the dollar payments industry coupled with the low ARPU in the country. Our dollar savings product was live during that time. Hence, also looked into revamping the support system for the product:- Integrated and ran parallel bots and a small team to handle social media comments and DMs to improve optics on such platforms. Primarily Instagram, Twitter and Telegram.- Reduced TAT for first response to under 15 minutes. Reduced resolution TAT to under a day for most of the tickets by integrating backend and building support dashboards.- Worked with a team of 12 support executives handling ~800 tickets a day.

experience.title: Business Manager
experience.description: Launched the F&O segment at Groww(Dec '21) under purview of management. Spotted points of uplift in acquisition, engagement, product and support. Worked with them to enhance the overall revenue of the segment. Few of the experiments I personally worked on:- Optimised the onboarding process by identifying major drop points and reduced them by optimizing flows for JTBD. Also built them off-app using automated engagement methods on whatsapp/email.- Worked to make the user journey more intuitive and less click for F&O users as time matters most to them. Introduced preference for page loads for F&O trading users.- Built and launched a well-diversified user segmentation and engagement program spread across push, email and WhatsApp. - Brought in sustainable referral programs. Hypothesis- "like attracts like" backed by data. We ran an experiment to reward top-tier users more than the lower cohorts for referring.- Liased with content team to launch continuous events for new traders to increase awareness while controlling costs.
